go_data.justification: DDB1 is part of the DDB1-CUL4-RBX1 (CRL4) ubiquitin ligase family.
DDB1, through the DCAF DDB2, facilitates nucleotide excision repair by detecting UV-induced pyrimidine dimers in the genome.
The DDB1-CUL4-RBX1 (CRL4) ubiquitin ligase family regulates cellular pathways through ubiquitination.
